title: Build a Minecraft house
description: Building a Minecraft house involves a blend of structural planning and creative detailing. Whether constructing a humble starter home or an elaborate mansion, the process generally follows these essential stages

title: We need to build a wall
description: "We need to build a wall" explores the history, politics, and social impact of border barriers. A deep dive into security, sovereignty, and human rights.

title: Make Japan great again
description:
This is an excerpt from my 81-page anthropology thesis titled “‘Make Japan Great Again’: An Emerging Class of Transnational Youths and Their Yaritaikoto for ‘Social Good’.”

<Table of Contents>
Abstract
“What Do You Want to Do for ‘Social Good’?” (Introduction)
Collaborative Methodology (Research Methods)
Brief History of Japanese Political Economy (Historical Background)
The Extremely Vague Approach to “Social Good” (Data Analysis #1)
The Disparity between the Foundation and Scholars (Data Analysis #2)
“What is Your Version of ‘Social Good’?” (Conclusion)
Recommendations to the Yanai Community (Appendix)
Bibliography

title: super cool project
description: A neural network (NN) is a brain-inspired machine learning model with interconnected nodes (neurons) in layers that learn patterns from data to perform complex tasks like image recognition or language translation, adapting and improving through weighted connections that adjust as they're trained, forming the foundation of modern AI.

title: My really cool project
description: Lorem Ipsum is simply dummy text of the printing and typesetting industry. title: CodeRover Hovercraft — Build It. Code It. Race It.
description: Since 2022, we’ve been on a mission to make STEM and Robotics fun and accessible through our CodeRover series — a line of build-it-yourself robots made from laser-cut parts and powered by smart electronics. Each project pushed the boundaries of what DIY robotics can be. But this time, we’re taking things to a whole new level. Lol!

title: New Budapest metro line
description: We have a plan to build M5. It will be the longest metro line stretching for 23 km. It will start at the east edge of Pest and go to South edge of Buda
